name: Rick and Morty
description: Web app for Rick and Morty's characters management, using React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and SASS. Git and GitHub were used as a version control system.

name: y
description: Web App of bussiness cards creation, responsive layout, mobile first, using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Flexbox and CSS Grid. Gulp was used as a task authomation tool and Git and GitHub as a version control system.

name: Manage your series
description: Web application for series' management, using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 y SASS. Gulp was used as a task authomation tool and Git and GitHub as a version control system.

name: Pokedex
description: Web application for the display and bookmark of pokemons (Pokedex), using React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 y SASS. Git and GitHub were used as a version control system.

name: Marea Coders
description: Webpage of presentation and contact of the team, responsive layout and mobile first, using HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Flexbox and CSS Grid. Gulp was used as a task authomation tool and Git and GitHub as a version control system.
